name: Les Salons de l'Aveyron
description: By car: at the Porte de Bercy exit, head towards Paris Centre, taking the first exit, Bercy Cour Saint-Emilion. By metro: Cour Saint-Emilion station on line 14. By bus: line 24 or 64, Dijon Lachambaudie stop.

name: The Frog at Bercy Village
description: Pub and microbrewery in an old cellar with beams and stone walls, with 2 terraces.
